com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr

Class PaymentTokenV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr.LevelUpCode
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr.PaymentTokenV2

  • @Immutable
public final class PaymentTokenV2
extends LevelUpCode

    Class to encompass the logic to parse v2 Payment tokens.

    Looks like (base 36 encoded):

    LU02012346712345678901234567010012LU

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isValidCode(java.lang.String qrData)
      Returns whether or not the QR code is a v1 code.
      static boolean isValidToken(java.lang.String qrData)
      Checks for validity of the token in v1 format (must have a v1 marker at the beginning and be 26 characters long).

    • Method Detail

      • isValidCode

        public static boolean isValidCode(@NonNull
                  java.lang.String qrData)
        Returns whether or not the QR code is a v1 code.
        Parameters:
        qrData - the data scanned from the QR code.
        Returns:
        true if it is a v1 code, false otherwise.

      • isValidToken

        public static boolean isValidToken(java.lang.String qrData)
        Checks for validity of the token in v1 format (must have a v1 marker at the beginning and be 26 characters long).
        Parameters:
        qrData - data to check.
        Returns:
        true if it's valid in v0; false otherwise.
